sentence.Network_en: I didn't mean any offence. It was a flippant, off-the-cuff remark.
sentence.Network_cn: 我本无意冒犯，那不过是句脱口而出的冒失话。

sentence.Network_en: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious!
sentence.Network_cn: 该死，不要不当回事！这是很严肃的！

sentence.Network_en: It was a flippant and unfeeling remark.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... riotous adj． 暴乱的，蛮横的 flippant adj 无礼的，轻率的 impudent adj． 鲁莽的，冒失的，无礼的 |.
油字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 油桐〖 tungtree〗 油头滑脑〖 slick;flippant〗 油箱〖 fueltank〗.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... riotous adj． 暴乱的，蛮横的 flippant adj 无礼的，轻率的 impudent adj． 鲁莽的，冒失的，无礼的 |.
Barron_800小新完整版v1.1 - 豆丁网 ... flagrant adj. 明目张胆的 flippant adj. 轻浮的 florid adj. 华丽的.

list.abs: a flippant answer , remark , attitude , etc., 漫不经心的回答 , 言语 , 态度等.
How people can be so flippant with money ., 怎么可以这样浪费钱.
He is content to draw the most flippant of morals from the story ., 他满足于从故事中引出最轻率的教训.
John was offended by the doctor ' s flippant attitude ., 约翰被医生轻率的态度而激怒.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from flip + -ant, perhaps on the pattern of heraldic terms such as couchant and rampant. Early senses included 'nimble' and 'talkative', hence 'playful', giving rise to the current use 'lacking seriousness'

entry.tran: 轻率的;轻浮的;不严肃的
entry.def: If you describe a person or what they say as flippant, you are criticizing them because you think they are not taking something as seriously as they should.

example.ex: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious!...
example.tran: 该死，不要不当回事！这是很严肃的！

example.ex: He now dismisses that as a flippant comment.
example.tran: 他现在把那当作轻率的随口一说不再理会了。

auth_sentence.content: The men at the operation were lewd and flippant.
auth_sentence.res_content: The men at the operation were lewd and flippant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The men at the operation were lewd and flippant.

auth_sentence.content: The tone ranged from flippant to furious.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tone ranged from flippant to furious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tone ranged from flippant to furious.

auth_sentence.content: I should never have talked in this flippant, superficial way.
auth_sentence.res_content: I should never have talked in this flippant, superficial way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I should never have talked in this flippant, superficial way.

sentences.en: She gave him a flippant answer.
sentences.cn: 她给了他一个无礼的答复。
